pli-tv-kd20:1.3.11: Atha kho āyasmā ānando → atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi (an8.51:1 [51. Gotamīsutta])
pli-tv-kd20:9.3.11: Tena kho pana samayena → tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū (sya-all, km)
pli-tv-kd20:9.4.18: bhikkhave, dve tisso bhikkhuniyo → dvīhi tīhi bhikkhunīhi (sya-all); dve tisso bhikkhunīhi (pts1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd20:10.4.3: naccaṃ → sanaccaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts1ed); samajjaṃ (mr); harītakapakkikaṃ → haritakapattikaṃ (sya-all); harītakapaṇṇikaṃ (pts1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd20:15.1.17: paṭiggāhāpetvā → paṭiggahāpetvā (sya-all, pts1ed, mr); bhikkhunīhi → bhikkhunīhi bhikkhūhi (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
pli-tv-kd20:15.2.17: sannidhiṃ bhikkhūhi → bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
pli-tv-kd20:19.1.15: bhikkhave, pacchābhattaṃ → bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā pacchābhattaṃ (sya-all, km)
pli-tv-kd20:27.4.100: sālokena naccena ca → sāloke sanaccena ca (bj); sālokena sanaccanaṃ (sya-all); sālokena sanaccena ca (pts1ed)
